adrFormatAddress: 1270 1st Ave., New York, NY 10065, USA

editorialSummary.text: Classic light fare & organic breads fill out the menu at this rustic-chic bakery/cafe chain.

originalText.text: They have good choices of pastries and bread. Restaurant available behind the bakery for those who’d rather sit and enjoy a meal.

text.text: They have good choices of pastries and bread. Restaurant available behind the bakery for those who’d rather sit and enjoy a meal.

originalText.text: Looking for a good bakery experience? Well, look no further! This spot offers truly superb food that will leave your taste buds dancing with joy. Sure, the service may be a tad slow, and a few staff members could work on their friendliness, but hey, it's all worth it once you sink your teeth into their delicious treats. If you're not in a rush and don't mind a little wait for some mouthwatering toast, this charming bakery is definitely the place for you. Treat yourself and indulge in their scrumptious creations!

text.text: Looking for a good bakery experience? Well, look no further! This spot offers truly superb food that will leave your taste buds dancing with joy. Sure, the service may be a tad slow, and a few staff members could work on their friendliness, but hey, it's all worth it once you sink your teeth into their delicious treats. If you're not in a rush and don't mind a little wait for some mouthwatering toast, this charming bakery is definitely the place for you. Treat yourself and indulge in their scrumptious creations!

originalText.text:
To whom it may Concern,
I’m writing this email to express the frustration and the lack of service I experienced at one of your properties.

The location is: 1270 1st Avenue New York, NY 10065

I was super excited to try Le pain Quotidien, as I just started working close to the area. I felt that I may have found my new lunch spot. However I was super disappointed. I ordered the chicken mozzarella melt and waited 25 minutes patiently, as I only had an hour lunch break, i went up to the register, and inquired about my order. When i inquired about my order the person at the register seemed annoyed. 5 minutes after she then came to speak to me to provide me an update. At that moment I learned that she was one of the managers. She informed me that my order was never put in, and the kitchen would be working on it. I then waited patiently for another 8 minutes. This was now a total of 38 minutes of my lunch hour wasted.  As the wait took so long I then decided to cancel my order and have it refunded to where I was advised by the same manager that the order would be coming out shortly. I was appalled at the fact that they denied me of opportunity of making it right and allow me to leave , as I asked to cancel the meal and have it refunded, instead yet again I got it will be out shortly. Never did I get an apology, the meal that I wanted to eat in the space, became a meal I had to eat as I was walking back to work, in order to avoid going over my lunch break.
I was super disappointed as I waited over 40 minutes of my lunch hour for an open face sandwich. I truly feel this was a lack of customer service and I will not be recommending any of my colleagues to your space. I’m hoping that this email can serve as a training opportunity for  communication and guest interaction. As tickets should not get lost, managers should be better trained in handling situations with guest. And no one should be waiting over a period of 40 minutes to receive an order for 1 person. I will be happy to provide further details if needed, and i thank you for reading my feedback.

originalText.text: The place is great, food was good. We had the chicken cob salad, a mozzarella chicken tartine and a hot chocolate. We enjoyed the food but we think it lacks some customer service from the employees.

text.text: The place is great, food was good. We had the chicken cob salad, a mozzarella chicken tartine and a hot chocolate. We enjoyed the food but we think it lacks some customer service from the employees.

originalText.text: Lovely place, yummy food. We had the mint tea, oatmeal with berries, and avocado toast. Everything was great. The avocado toast was craveable. I will be back. The prices were very good as well.

text.text: Lovely place, yummy food. We had the mint tea, oatmeal with berries, and avocado toast. Everything was great. The avocado toast was craveable. I will be back. The prices were very good as well.
